pages.text: $(li)The Sunflower Plains is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/plains)Plains$(/l) biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find flowers like Sunflowers, Buttercups and Cornflowers.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/hummingbird)Hummingbirds$(/l) can be found flying around here pollinating the flowers of this biome.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Sunflower Plains$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
